name: typescript
description: This an example of using esptool-js with parcel and typescript

scripts.genDocs: cd ../.. && npm run genDocs && mkdir -p examples/typescript/dist && cp -r docs examples/typescript/dist && cd examples/typescript
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run genDocs && parcel src/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && PARCEL_WORKERS=0 parcel build src/index.html --no-optimize --public-url ./
